name: MPMediaPlayback
desc: A protocol that defines the interface for controlling audio media playback.

items.name: func play()
items.desc: Initiates playback of the current item.

items.name: func pause()
items.desc: Pauses playback of the current item.

items.name: func stop()
items.desc: Ends playback of the current item.

items.name: func prepareToPlay()
items.desc: Prepares a media player for playback.

items.name: var isPreparedToPlay: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether a media player is ready to play.

items.name: func beginSeekingBackward()
items.desc: Begins seeking backward through the media content.

items.name: func beginSeekingForward()
items.desc: Begins seeking forward through the media content.

items.name: func endSeeking()
items.desc: Ends forward and backward seeking through the media content.

items.name: var currentPlaybackRate: Float
items.desc: The current playback rate for the player.

items.name: var currentPlaybackTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The current position of the playhead.

items.name: static let MPMediaPlaybackIsPreparedToPlayDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Indicates that the prepared to play status of the media player has changed.
